message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to let it go for $10,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is important to you, but based on my budget, I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit away from my desired price.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?  I'm confident this product will be worth it to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our values.
